name: NidoArena: VR
description:
Overview

Play as a specialized Nido model, tasked with helping the human sort his food intake. Punch your way through piles of food while avoiding other nasty surprises that might lurk in the stomach...

Tutorial

*Oculus Rift VR headset required to play

NidoArena: VR was created by SHVFS GD02 students in a span of 3 months
